KB.Purpose: Re-engage leads who are not ready now but may be in the future. Human-paced, light-touch follow-up.

Day2: Just checking in—still thinking about the property?
Wanted to see if anything changed since we last talked.
Day5: Hope all’s well. Any update on your plans with the property?
Quick follow-up—still open to discussing options?
Day9: It’s been a bit—just circling back. Still exploring what to do?
Checking in again—are you open to revisit this later?
Day14: Wanted to keep in touch. Has your situation changed?
Touching base—still want me to check back in?
Day20: It’s been a few weeks—should I keep you on my follow-up list?
Happy to circle back in the future if timing isn’t right now.

DecisionRules.if_engaged: Return to pillar qualification where left off.
DecisionRules.if_not_interested: Tag NOT_SELLING_YET; drop to Long-Term Nurture.
DecisionRules.if_silent: Complete loop, then tag FOLLOWUP_COMPLETE; exit until re-engaged.
